messages.title: WE DEMAND BETTER THAN THIS BREXIT MESS
messages.content: Boris Johnson leads most unpopular new government in 40 years. 'Donald Trump backs Johnson’s Brexit strategy.' 'Millions of Tories will now vote Lib Dem because of Brexit'

messages.title: THIS ELECTION IS YOUR CHANCE TO STOP BREXIT

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Climate change and air pollution threaten our future. The climate crisis needs urgent national and local change to cut transport emissions and support cycling.
Citizens play a vital role in Oxford’s health and education services. We need to fund these properly, not via the route of Conservative-enabled privatisations.
By staying in the EU, we can reduce inequality and safeguard manufacturing and technology jobs.
